metadata.title: Global Online MS in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Business Analytics | USF Muma College of Business

chunks.content:
Find course descriptions in the USF Catalog View Program Calendar  The Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence and Business Analytics program offered
               remotely across the globe integrates technology development and data analytics, while
               its strong focus on leadership development will equip you to overcome issues that
               include communication, self-awareness, team orientation, and accountability. The Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence and Business Analytics program offered
               globally through remote video conferencing facility is designed for professionals
               around the world who want to move into management positions in the data analytics,
               information systems and information technologies arenas. This is an advanced STEM-certified
               business degree, which covers both the technology related to business analytics and

metadata.title: Global Online MS in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Business Analytics | USF Muma College of Business

chunks.content:
business degree, which covers both the technology related to business analytics and
               the managerial aspects of implementing these technologies in organizations. Graduate
               students leave with a firm grasp of how to use big data, data science, project management,
               and information technology strategies in technology leadership. The program is geared towards working professionals. Leadership development is integrated
               into each course to help students move forward in their careers. The six-credit-hour project lasts over the course of the program. Faculty experts
               guide students as they develop a prototype technology system or derive insights out
               of publicly available datasets. Students may use this opportunity to prepare a paper

metadata.title: Global Online MS in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Business Analytics | USF Muma College of Business

chunks.content:
guide students as they develop a prototype technology system or derive insights out
               of publicly available datasets. Students may use this opportunity to prepare a paper
               for submission to an international peer reviewed conference. $18,975 USD for the complete program staggered over one calendar year and three semesters.

metadata.title: Global Online MS in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Business Analytics | USF Muma College of Business
